explains: adj. 普遍的；流行的；盛传的

sentences.en: Los Angeles is rife with gossip about the stars' private lives.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶盛传明星私生活的流言飞语。

sentences.en: It is a country where corruption is rife.
sentences.cn: 这是个腐败成风的国家。

sentences.en: Speculation is rife that he will be fired.
sentences.cn: 他将被解雇的猜测盛行。
